punjabi: ੴ ਸਤਿਨਾਮੁ ਕਰਤਾ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਨਿਰਵੈਰੁ ਅਕਾਲ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਅਜੂਨੀ ਸੈਭੰ ਗੁਰਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: om satinaamu karataa purakhu nirabha_u niravairu akaala moorati ajoonee saibham' guraprasaadi ..
transliterations.indic_iast: oṃ satināmu karatā purakhu nirabhau niravairu akāla mūrati ajūnī saibhaṃ guraprasādi ||
transliterations.indic_hk: OM satinAmu karatA purakhu nirabhau niravairu akAla mUrati ajUnI saibhaM guraprasAdi ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: OM satinAmu karatA purakhu nirabhau niravairu akAla mUrati ajUnI saibhaM guraprasAdi ||

punjabi: ਹੈ ਭੀ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਹੋਸੀ ਭੀ ਸਚੁ ॥੧॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: hai bhee sachu naanaka hosee bhee sachu ..1..
transliterations.indic_iast: hai bhī sacu nānaka hosī bhī sacu ||1||
transliterations.indic_hk: hai bhI sacu nAnaka hosI bhI sacu ||1||
transliterations.indic_itrans: hai bhI sachu nAnaka hosI bhI sachu ||1||

punjabi: ਸੋਚੈ ਸੋਚਿ ਨ ਹੋਵਈ ਜੇ ਸੋਚੀ ਲਖ ਵਾਰ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: sochai sochi na hovaee je sochee lakha vaara ..
transliterations.indic_iast: socai soci na hovaī je socī lakha vāra ||
transliterations.indic_hk: socai soci na hovaI je socI lakha vAra ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: sochai sochi na hovaI je sochI lakha vAra ||

punjabi: ਚੁਪੈ ਚੁਪ ਨ ਹੋਵਈ ਜੇ ਲਾਇ ਰਹਾ ਲਿਵ ਤਾਰ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: chupai chupa na hovaee je laai rahaa liva taara ..
transliterations.indic_iast: cupai cupa na hovaī je lāi rahā liva tāra ||
transliterations.indic_hk: cupai cupa na hovaI je lAi rahA liva tAra ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: chupai chupa na hovaI je lAi rahA liva tAra ||

punjabi: ਭੁਖਿਆ ਭੁਖ ਨ ਉਤਰੀ ਜੇ ਬੰਨਾ ਪੁਰੀਆ ਭਾਰ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: bhukhiaa bhukha na utaree je bannaa pureeaa bhaara ..
transliterations.indic_iast: bhukhiā bhukha na utarī je baṃnā purīā bhāra ||
transliterations.indic_hk: bhukhiA bhukha na utarI je baMnA purIA bhAra ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: bhukhiA bhukha na utarI je baMnA purIA bhAra ||

punjabi: ਸਹਸ ਸਿਆਣਪਾ ਲਖ ਹੋਹਿ ਤ ਇਕ ਨ ਚਲੈ ਨਾਲਿ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: sahasa siaanapaa lakha hohi ta ika na chalai naali ..
transliterations.indic_iast: sahasa siāṇapā lakha hohi ta ika na calai nāli ||
transliterations.indic_hk: sahasa siANapA lakha hohi ta ika na calai nAli ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: sahasa siANapA lakha hohi ta ika na chalai nAli ||

punjabi: ਕਿਵ ਸਚਿਆਰਾ ਹੋਈਐ ਕਿਵ ਕੂੜੈ ਤੁਟੈ ਪਾਲਿ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: kiva sachiaaraa hoeeai kiva koorai tut'ai paali ..
transliterations.indic_iast: kiva saciārā hoīai kiva kūr̤ai tuṭai pāli ||
transliterations.indic_hk: kiva saciArA hoIai kiva kUr3ai tuTai pAli ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: kiva sachiArA hoIai kiva kU.Dai tuTai pAli ||

punjabi: ਹੁਕਮਿ ਰਜਾਈ ਚਲਣਾ ਨਾਨਕ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਨਾਲਿ ॥੧॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: hukami rajaaee chalanaa naanaka likhiaa naali ..1..
transliterations.indic_iast: hukami rajāī calaṇā nānaka likhiā nāli ||1||
transliterations.indic_hk: hukami rajAI calaNA nAnaka likhiA nAli ||1||
transliterations.indic_itrans: hukami rajAI chalaNA nAnaka likhiA nAli ||1||

punjabi: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਹੋਵਨਿ ਆਕਾਰ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਕਹਿਆ ਜਾਈ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: hukamee hovani aakaara hukamu na kahiaa jaaee ..
transliterations.indic_iast: hukamī hovani ākāra hukamu na kahiā jāī ||
transliterations.indic_hk: hukamI hovani AkAra hukamu na kahiA jAI ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: hukamI hovani AkAra hukamu na kahiA jAI ||

punjabi: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਹੋਵਨਿ ਜੀਅ ਹੁਕਮਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਵਡਿਆਈ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: hukamee hovani jeea hukami milai vad'iaaee ..
transliterations.indic_iast: hukamī hovani jīa hukami milai vaḍiāī ||
transliterations.indic_hk: hukamI hovani jIa hukami milai vaDiAI ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: hukamI hovani jIa hukami milai vaDiAI ||

punjabi: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਉਤਮੁ ਨੀਚੁ ਹੁਕਮਿ ਲਿਖਿ ਦੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਪਾਈਅਹਿ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: hukamee utamu neechu hukami likhi dukha sukha paaeeahi ..
transliterations.indic_iast: hukamī utamu nīcu hukami likhi dukha sukha pāīahi ||
transliterations.indic_hk: hukamI utamu nIcu hukami likhi dukha sukha pAIahi ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: hukamI utamu nIchu hukami likhi dukha sukha pAIahi ||

punjabi: ਇਕਨਾ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਬਖਸੀਸ ਇਕਿ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਸਦਾ ਭਵਾਈਅਹਿ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: ikanaa hukamee bakhaseesa iki hukamee sadaa bhavaaeeahi ..
transliterations.indic_iast: ikanā hukamī bakhasīsa iki hukamī sadā bhavāīahi ||
transliterations.indic_hk: ikanA hukamI bakhasIsa iki hukamI sadA bhavAIahi ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: ikanA hukamI bakhasIsa iki hukamI sadA bhavAIahi ||

punjabi: ਹੁਕਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭੁ ਕੋ ਬਾਹਰਿ ਹੁਕਮ ਨ ਕੋਇ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: hukamai andari sabhu ko baahari hukama na koi ..
transliterations.indic_iast: hukamai aṃdari sabhu ko bāhari hukama na koi ||
transliterations.indic_hk: hukamai aMdari sabhu ko bAhari hukama na koi ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: hukamai aMdari sabhu ko bAhari hukama na koi ||

punjabi: ਨਾਨਕ ਹੁਕਮੈ ਜੇ ਬੁਝੈ ਤ ਹਉਮੈ ਕਹੈ ਨ ਕੋਇ ॥੨॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: naanaka hukamai je bujhai ta ha_umai kahai na koi ..2..
transliterations.indic_iast: nānaka hukamai je bujhai ta haumai kahai na koi ||2||
transliterations.indic_hk: nAnaka hukamai je bujhai ta haumai kahai na koi ||2||
transliterations.indic_itrans: nAnaka hukamai je bujhai ta haumai kahai na koi ||2||

punjabi: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਤਾਣੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਕਿਸੈ ਤਾਣੁ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: gaavai ko taanu hovai kisai taanu ..
transliterations.indic_iast: gāvai ko tāṇu hovai kisai tāṇu ||
transliterations.indic_hk: gAvai ko tANu hovai kisai tANu ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: gAvai ko tANu hovai kisai tANu ||

punjabi: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਸਾਜਿ ਕਰੇ ਤਨੁ ਖੇਹ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: gaavai ko saaji kare tanu kheha ..
transliterations.indic_iast: gāvai ko sāji kare tanu kheha ||
transliterations.indic_hk: gAvai ko sAji kare tanu kheha ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: gAvai ko sAji kare tanu kheha ||

punjabi: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਜੀਅ ਲੈ ਫਿਰਿ ਦੇਹ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: gaavai ko jeea lai phiri deha ..
transliterations.indic_iast: gāvai ko jīa lai phiri deha ||
transliterations.indic_hk: gAvai ko jIa lai phiri deha ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: gAvai ko jIa lai phiri deha ||

punjabi: ਮੰਨੇ ਕੀ ਗਤਿ ਕਹੀ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: manne kee gati kahee na jaai ..
transliterations.indic_iast: maṃne kī gati kahī na jāi ||
transliterations.indic_hk: maMne kI gati kahI na jAi ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: maMne kI gati kahI na jAi ||

punjabi: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਮੰਨਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਮਨਿ ਕੋਇ ॥੧੨॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: je ko manni jaanai mani koi ..12..
transliterations.indic_iast: je ko maṃni jāṇai mani koi ||12||
transliterations.indic_hk: je ko maMni jANai mani koi ||12||
transliterations.indic_itrans: je ko maMni jANai mani koi ||12||

punjabi: ਮੰਨੈ ਜਮ ਕੈ ਸਾਥਿ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: mannai jama kai saathi na jaai ..
transliterations.indic_iast: maṃnai jama kai sāthi na jāi ||
transliterations.indic_hk: maMnai jama kai sAthi na jAi ||
transliterations.indic_itrans: maMnai jama kai sAthi na jAi ||

punjabi: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਮੰਨਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਮਨਿ ਕੋਇ ॥੧੩॥

transliterations.aksharamukha: je ko manni jaanai mani koi ..13..
transliterations.indic_iast: je ko maṃni jāṇai mani koi ||13||
transliterations.indic_hk: je ko maMni jANai mani koi ||13||
transliterations.indic_itrans: je ko maMni jANai mani koi ||13||
